肥賓斷言不對紅軍放水
now.com 體育2019年4月29日 下午4:35
【Now Sports-體育】紐卡素下場英超鬥正跟曼城爭奪冠軍的利物浦。對於或會對前東家放水的嫌疑，領隊賓尼迪斯斷言不會。

「我們會踢出跟整個球季一樣的足球，嘗試勝出這場比賽。我們在主場面對自家球迷，將會付出所有。」賓尼迪斯（Rafael Benitez）說。「我的責任是照顧紐卡素，同時也希望對手可以踢出最佳表現。」 肥賓跟紐卡素的合約在數星期後就完結，雙方已經展開了續約的談判。上場作客以1:1賽和白禮頓，喜鵲球迷就高歌希望59歲的他留隊，肥賓表示：「我很高興。特別是球迷遠道而來，支持球隊及他們的領隊。」 「若續約有新消息，我會告訴大家，現在只談比賽。這需要一點時間，因為這樣對雙方都是最好的。」就算未能達成續約協議，肥賓亦不愁出路，有傳法甲雙雄巴黎聖日耳門、馬賽都對他有興趣
肥賓終於肯打醒我地班死利狗

BREAKING: Liverpool are handing fit-again Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain a new contract.

Oxlade-Chamberlain will sign a 12-month extension just days after he made a return to first team action following a long-term knee injury.

Stats show Manchester United keeper David de Gea is having an even worse season than Liverpool flop Loris Karius is enduring on loan at Besiktas

Karius is currently on a two-year loan at Besiktas in Turkey, having lost his place at Anfield following a series of high profile errors, most notably in the Champions League final against Real Madrid.

However he has improved in Turkey, with just 39 goals conceded this season in 33 matches - an average of 1.2 per game, according to WhoScored.

This is in comparison to 53 allowed in by De Gea over the course of 38 matches - 1.4 goals conceded per game on average.

Karius has also managed to save a penalty this season, this week against Ankaragucu - while De Gea has been beaten by all six spot kicks he has faced this campaign.

A "Home-Grown Player" means a player who, irrespective of nationality or age, has been registered with any club affiliated to The Football Association or the Football Association of Wales for a period, continuous or not, of three entire seasons, or 36 months, before his 21st birthday (or the end of the season during which he turns 21).
